author: William Sanchez
title: Global Pandemic: Fighting the Virus in War Zones
description: Social distancing, home confinement and working remotely are all helping to stifle the spread of the virus but what if it hits a war zone, a refugee camp or some foreign detention center? Organizations like the International Red Cross who are on the ground in…
